# Organization of the Course {-}

### Timetable {-}

```{r, echo=FALSE}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library("kableExtra"))
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library("tidyverse"))

timetable <- tibble("Mondays"      = c("Theory",      "Break",       "Theory",      "Open Coding Space"),
                    "Time"         = c("14:15-15:45", "15:45-16:15", "16:15-17:15", "17:15-17:45"),
                    "Lecture Hall" = c("Jur / Lecture Hall K"))
           
timetable %>% kbl() %>%  kable_styling()
```
